text: David Howard Burcher (born 26 October 1950)David Burcher player profile Scrum.com is a former Wales international rugby union player. He was capped four times for Wales in 1977 and that same year he toured New Zealand with the British and Irish Lions, playing in one international.David Bursher Lions profile Lionsrugby.com Burcher played club rugby for Newport RFC. ==Notes== Category:1950 births Category:Living people Category:Wales international rugby union players Category:Welsh rugby union players Category:British and Irish Lions rugby union players from Wales Category:Newport RFC players Category:Cardiff RFC players Category:Barbarian F.C. players Category:Newport HSOB RFC players Category:Rugby union players from Newport, Wales Category:Alumni of the University of Exeter
title: David Burcher
